literals: f"Your On-Duty form has been {approval_status}. Please find the attached document."
f"Your absentee form has been {approval_status}. Please find the attached document."

f"""

Dear Counsellor,

The student {student.name} (Reg No: {student.reg_no}) has submitted a leave form. Below are the details:

Field Value
Name {student.name}
Registration Number {student.reg_no}
Gender {student.gender}
From Date {student.start_date}
To Date {student.end_date}
Reason {student.reason}
Department {student.department}

Please review the request and take appropriate action:

Agree Disagree

Best regards,
The Attendance System

"""
f"Your leave request has been disapproved by the Class Counsellor."

"""
